2. If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

action.content: DESCRIPTION: the TARGET ROOM is a recording studio featuring a large mixing console with multiple sliders and knobs, positioned centrally.
